website_summaries.verdict: If you want an affordable yet high-quality curtain to block out most light, this is the best value for your money.
pros: Garners praise for its noise-reducing capabilities and well-rounded coverage

customer_reviews.title: ... to keep the room warm in the winter yet cool in the summer
customer_reviews.text: How do they manage to keep the room warm in the winter yet cool in the summer?: Amazing! You read some things that sound too good to be true, but these really work. And if you're needing them solely as blackout curtains, they will do a fabulous job of room darkening, as well. (I couldn't speak to other lighter colors, but my set is the indigo blue and I feel it would have worked even in WW2 to keep any small slivers of light from escaping. If they can work that well - - you know they're good.)
customer_reviews.author: Sea-song by moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Had to pin the top so sun doesn't come up and keep me awake but otherwise great buy.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, i'm new at buying black out curtains and only just heard of them recently when I was on a phone conversation expressing that I need a way to keep the light out now that i'm working nights and sleeping days. But overall I am happy and my window is small enough that I only needed one. They are long enough that I could fold a bit of the top part upwards and pin it to the wall to keep the sun from shining on the ceiling and keeping me up. Probably a better way to do it but I made it work. Would definitely buy again. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: April Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is faulty/ Looks Bad--I'm returning AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered eight of these panels. Four I'm using. The other four were ordered in two batches. The first batch had two similar but different (fabric) panels. One of these panels had bad stitching. I sent them back and reordered two which I now have to send back because the stitching was BAD/uneven again. I like the curtain but they have to stop sending me rejects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not blackout at all.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are not the quality they used to be. They aren't truly blackout, as they show little specks of light throughout the entire curtain. They make the room unbearably hot, even in the winter time, because there is no backing to these curtains, which there used to be. An incredible disappointment. I wish I could return them, but I'm outside of the return window. See all those specks? That's light shining through! Even though I have another curtain (double rod) behind it! I want my money back :(
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the Eclipse Faux Linen fabric
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but not what I expected. Pros- Blocks out light very well. Cons- Fabric feels very cheap.Not as nice as the Eclipse Faux Linen fabric. I accidentally ordered this thinking it had grommets, but it does not. It has short, separated fabric "sleeves" along the length of curtain panel for the rod to go through. It does its job though and fortunately the rod I bought went through the sleeves (1" in diameter). I just hate the feeling of the polyester fabric. I haven't noticed that it reduces noise significantly, but I was mainly concerned about the light.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality curtains
customer_reviews.text: Completely blackout! Keeps the room cool and helps me sleep. Thick and well put together, definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Blocks light completely!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed these to convert a small room with a very large, sunny window into a dark room for photography. I can't have even a little light sneak through even around the edges so I hung them up with nails instead of a curtain rod to eliminate any gaps. I really thought I would need to hang another layer of fabric behind them to make the room totally dark, but these curtains actually block out all the light completely! Amazing! And they're nice, sturdy fabric to that I believe will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Adina Cook

customer_reviews.text: The product details description is very misleading. It says 2 items, and on a different style of curtains (same brand/company) it clearly says ONE and it was for HALF the price, so naturally I thought that since the Fresno ones were double the price & it said TWO ITEMS that there were two panels in the box. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Marie

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement of product
customer_reviews.text: Not thermal. Seemed to be a nice material but not what advertised. I got this as an open box price and saw Wal-Mart was having a roll back sale on REAL thermal eclipse blackout curtains and purchased TWO panels for the same price as this one. Do your diligence when it comes to shopping bc MOST things are in fact NOT cheaper and are knockoffs on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Newell

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I get terrible migraines, and when I have one pulling these shut makes it truly feel like night time so that I can rest. They block probably 95% of the light (depending on how close you can get the curtain rods to the wall). No light leaks through the curtains themselves, and any that leaks around the edges you can adjust to mitigate. Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: sarahliz1624

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blackout ability.
customer_reviews.text: We have had the gray ones for about a year and they do an amazing job of blocking out the sun. It's hard to believe because they are not very thick. We've tried several other black out ones before we found these. We have several small kids and they have held up great. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Darkest Room In The House
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool! I love them to bit, they do a way better job than our old curtains, which let so much light in through the black fabric, it was ridiculous. The only down side is that they only have one in each order and I thought it was going to be two in a pack. Other than that, if these do provide any noise cancellation, the most possible is not a noticeable decibel as mere fabric can't really help with that, so that's kinda a false advert, but w/e. (:
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Block sun and heat well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these panels to cover my front window. ..3/4 were perfect. .the 4th was an inch shorter than the other 3... I put a sheer curtain behind it to make the shorter one less obvious. ....otherwise... they do keep the sun and heat out! We live in Vegas and afternoon sun is insane! I noticed in the first hour when our ac kicked on less times! So A+ for light and heat blocking. I would of gave 5 stars if the one panel wasn't an inch shorter than the other 3.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Christie

customer_reviews.title: This curtain is a must have!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find just the right "blackout" curtain for my bedroom. I am very impressed with the quality of the fabric and especially the fact that it delivers as promised. After hanging the curtain, my room is nearly completely dark. Another attractive feature about this product, is that it is very easy to care for, since it doesn't contain a liner or hard plastic backing.
customer_reviews.author: gingersnap

customer_reviews.title: This curtain panel really blocks light
customer_reviews.text: These are true blackout curtains. I bought a single panel as I didn't need mor than that for the window I wanted it for. I got the charcoal color, and it truly deserves the name blackout as it blocks the light very efficiently. Because they are made of a thicker material, the curtains won't hang as nicely when they're opened as thinner curtains would, but I didn't get them for looks. The point is that they block the light, which they do!
customer_reviews.author: jpevball9

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Light Blocking for Computer Gaming Room
customer_reviews.text: Amazing- I put this curtain up in a computer/gaming room, and I never realized just how ineffective the current window coverings were until I found the room completely dark except for the light above the window from the space between the curtain rod and window frame. More than dark enough, and also looks very clean and uncluttered, with the sheen giving a touch of elegance. I purchased one panel, which was ample coverage for an average bedroom window and reached the floor. I may have to buy more of these. They are more heavy and thick than I realized, which is good. I'm glad I purchased the Rod Desyne heavy duty curtain rod at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Abacus

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: I have a south-facing window that gets light all day. Bit of an issue when you're on night shift. I tried one of these alone and it worked reasonably well. Most light is omitted by the fabric. However, between the edges of the curtains letting light through and the fact that TINY pin-pricks of light can be seen here and there on the fabric, I will say it won't get your room 100% dark in daytime. If you have a VERY bright room like mine, I will say a nice solution is to use this /with/ the ron-loc fabric. That's that I did, and it is 100% dark even on the brightest of days.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open all the way
customer_reviews.text: the dark color does a decent job. No idea about other colors, I got Espresso. these do not insulate, they use a different method for blocking light they have huge self fabric tabs to put the curtain rod through so it is hard to open them all the way. I ended up mounting the curtain rod 6 inches past the edge of the window so that the curtain would have somewhere to be during the day and not block the window.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn Johannsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought 3 of these, for $20 each for an upcoming deployment. Turns out they're pretty legit and their length is much greater than the more expensive brand I bought at walmart. They block out most of the light pretty effectively, gonna buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shadi Zahed

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great curtains! Thick material. Blocks out really well. However, a lot of fraying on the seams and edges. (Pictures included) Otherwise, really awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Domon38

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic curtains that block out 99% of light - highly recommend for daytime sleepers.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are fantastic. We have very bright afternoon sunlight come through our living room bay window that would shine right into our eyes if we were sitting on the couch. These curtains block 99% of the blinding sunlight and make the room so dark I can easily take a nap. The material is medium to heavy weight and appears to be high quality. These curtains were a bit tall for our 8 foot ceilings, but that's on me - I should've measured my ceilings, my window, and where I planned on placing the curtain rod, so I advise anyone else to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jan van Eyck

customer_reviews.title: actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because a lot of light would come in to my apartment. I was skeptical that they would really "black out" but wow i was amazed it really made a difference. They really do "blackout" everything. I recently got my new electric bill and saved $30 in this light bill thanks to these. If you want to save money on your electric bill and keep your place cool buy these. They are a good investment. The only thing i didn't like is the material used but if it saves me money on the electric bill and keeps my place cool in this super hot texas weather then that doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica O.

customer_reviews.title: Great option for blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely great!!! They are super easy to put up and easy to wash and dry. Love them. Keeps out the sun and keeps the room cool.
customer_reviews.author: Annoying

customer_reviews.title: they are very heavy
customer_reviews.text: they are not as light As the ones I am replaceing alittle heavy for my liking and the material will have oulls if it is snags on anything.
customer_reviews.author: Shenna

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out all of the light! Looks great
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They block out 100% of the light, except for any light that gets out above the curtain rod or on the sides if they are not flush against the wall. This has helped me get MUCH deeper sleeps in the morning, and I feel overall better. The only thing to worry about is that it makes it very easy to sleep in extra late if you don't have any reason to get up :)
customer_reviews.author: Yhea

customer_reviews.title: Great at blocking light and heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a sliding glass door that faces East so it gets full sun in the morning which lets a lot of heat in the room. These curtains block almost all light just like the description states 99% light blocking, they also are pretty good at reducing the amount of heat that comes through. The only issue I had was trying to get the wrinkles out of them because it says to not iron them but to put them in the dryer on a low setting with a damp towel, this only partially helped but with time I think most of the wrinkles will come out.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, cheap look
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my bedroom and when they came I was hugely disappointed. The material is cheap, shiny polyester and the color wasn’t as dark as the picture makes it seem. I returned them and got something much nicer at IKEA.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains. Obviously, the black ones are the best, if not the only choice to truly block the light. They work perfectly. A few wrinkles, but nothing to be a drag about. Would definitely buy again, and recommend. Black only, though, they are called "black" out curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: You dont know what you have been missing.
customer_reviews.text: Had only the wood blinds for years, hated light permeating the room even watching my LCD television, it was too bright. These curtains do an excellent job of blacking out the light. I do recommend getting a double rod curtain set up, and having some frilly fancy curtain on the second rod, even though I did not do this and am still pleased with the overall color, look and texture. Was debating between 4 stars, but the fact they pull off as the only curtain, and make the room as dark as night... its 5 stars. Will update how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Interstellar

customer_reviews.title: Thermal curtains are great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these curtains really keep the sun out in the early morning when you want to sleep more. I didn’t buy them for noise cancellation. Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Good runner up.
customer_reviews.text: The original set were mismatched in their length so I sent them back in return for 2 more and they are fine. They're not as great at blocking out light as my previous blackout curtains but they do enough, they are thinner than expected. The color was exactly as described and is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The light color is not blackout and no noise reduction. But soft and looked ok.
customer_reviews.text: I got the color Wheat and it does not block light completely. Would not call blackout. But that wasn't the issue for me as I wasn't set on perfect darkness. I bought them for noise reduction which they did NONE of. I sent it back for that reason. Looked ok, not amazing but for the money as can be expected. The material is very soft and drapes nicely. The tabs on the top make it sit better on the rod than the sleeve. You have both options which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shefeline

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice; however...
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are made of the best quality. They block out the sun and some of the sound. They are very, very nice; however, the lengths do not match. I ordered several, but I could not get 2 that were the exact same length.
customer_reviews.author: bmuzicall

customer_reviews.title: Using in a warehouse
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to cut down on heat in a warehouse that has very large windows. These curtains have done a great job of cutting back the overall amount of heat that beats through the windows, which will help save on a high electricity bill. The material is thick and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps sun, heat out
customer_reviews.text: These work. Keeps the bedroom from getting the morning light and in late afternoon I can feel the heat they are absorbing. Definitely helps keep the bedroom cooler. Black isn't the most stylish of drapes but whatever, this is sleeping chamber, not a fashion statement! I like that it has pole pockets instead of grommets(it has optional tabs) as the grommets will let in the light above. These are thick and hang well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Curtain
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cool keeps sun out ! I thought it was a set but is was for one window have to order For another window !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I had, not a complete fix.
customer_reviews.text: These are far better than regular curtains and better than the blankets I draped over the window, but they do still let a fair amount of light through the material. Anywhere I overlap the curtains, it does a better job. It'd almost be better to have ordered two layers worth of curtains. I'll bet it would have knocked out the light then. Oh... and aesthetically, they're kind of ugly imo.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic
customer_reviews.text: bought for child's apt. who's bedroom faces a streetlight outside the window and somewhat busy street and hot Florida morning sunshine. Upon installation could feel instant change in room temperature and they are definitely "blackout". She has remarked how much quieter her room is now and has a cool room in the morning. This company makes curtains said to offer more blakoutedness(my word). Can't imagine how dark those would make a room.
customer_reviews.author: Average guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These worked out perfect to install where I didn’t have space behind the curtain rod bc the Vinyl curtain behind. These can hang to the inside better than the style on the right
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Issa Blackout!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of these curtains! They're super thick, and in turn have the ability blackout light, heat and noise! I am now able to walk into a cool apartment in the dead of Texas summer, because of these curtains. And, I'm now able to sleep much more peacefully, as the temperature in my place rarely ever changes. Though I originally felt like they were expensive for curtains, they have definitely been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LaTina Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Light? What light?
customer_reviews.text: These things do a very, very excellent job of blocking light. I have them covering the windows in my bedroom and the skylight above my projector wall, and they block almost all of the light. My bedroom is pitch black at night, and my projector wall has no seepage of light from the skylight. They also do a decent job as a heat insulator. I installed them in a downstairs, poorly heated bedroom. They're not going to duplicate double pane windows, but there was a definite increase in the heat level in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Elvendude

customer_reviews.title: A pretty color of blue, but not dark navy
customer_reviews.text: Though this product turned out not to be for me, it might be for you. The color is a pretty blue, but not the dark navy I needed, as pictured. Seemed like it would be a durable fabric. Had the color been right, I may have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome CURTAIN, but the PICTURE MISLEADS you to think ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome CURTAIN, but the PICTURE MISLEADS you to think your getting two. VERY UPSET but in the end I needed a shorter curtain either way 36" to fit where the AC is, so I can't complain except for the fact that I could've gotten two thinsulate blackout curtains for similar price and just cutt the other pannel. The single curtain is a rare length, and does black out. It looks ok, but I feel it could have a nicer texture rather than a wrinkled denim look. IT DOES KEEP LIGHT OUT though!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Not true blackout
customer_reviews.text: This includes one curtain panel, and it is not a true blackout curtain. Thick, and helps with light, but definitely not on par with my other true blackout curtains. I ordered the wheat color, and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blackout curtain with around 90% blocking through material
customer_reviews.text: I use these curtains in a north east facing window which in the Pacific Northwest summer gets hits by the sun's rays very early. The curtains keep the room dark enough that i do not wake up too early and the material is a light, nylon fiber type material with around 90% blocking of the light through the material. There is some edge light leakage but that is the result of the curtain rod placement closeness to the wall and above the window top. I recommend these curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love this blackout panel
customer_reviews.text: Love this blackout panel. I sometimes work extended periods during the night and sleep during the day and I wanted something a (little) more classy than putting up aluminum foil on my windows so I got one of these. It fits over my rather large window when I hang it sideways and blocks out about 99.5% of the light. Any light getting through is where the fabric has been stretched and really isn't noticeable unless you get close.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Works great in his room , works night shift and sleeps in the daytime
customer_reviews.author: liz harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good length for door
customer_reviews.text: We used this to keep out light coming in from a door during a performance. It has 4 loops on the back side, I thought the pole was going to slide through the curtain, but it just slides through the loops on the back side.
customer_reviews.author: HappyKido

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality but did the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 panels all had the same problem. These are sewn very uneven across the top. Materiel is fine, very blacked out. I expected more from eclipse. My old eclipse were much better for the same money.
customer_reviews.author: System1459

customer_reviews.title: Finally pitch black!
customer_reviews.text: At home, I devised blackout curtains for my room- Blankets, sheets and curtains to make my room pitch black. Now that I'm on my own, I wanted to devise it again, but then I remembered... blackout curtains! They really work. I put them over the venetian blinds I already had on my windows, and it's wonderful. I've got 46 wide and 75 high windows, and one panel is all I need. I tuck in the edges under the blinds and I cannot see a THING in my bedroom now. Exactly what a light sleeper like me needs!
customer_reviews.author: A. Price

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Just as advertised. It is thick and blocks most of the light. Our son and infant daughter sleep sooner and wake up a little later due to the limited sunlight. This is especially helpful as it gets dark very late as we are currently in the summer season. There are days when there is still light outside after 9pm. Glad we got this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robinson Mertilus

customer_reviews.title: Light filtering and energy saving curtains
customer_reviews.text: Eclipse curtains are excellent. They filter out a lot of light and hrlp to keep the room warm
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Thick curtian, does what curtians do.
customer_reviews.text: The curtain keeps the room they are installed in noticably cooler, between 4 and 7°F--just by blocking radiant energy and providing an air barrier between the window and inside of the home.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C. Landfield

customer_reviews.title: Stupid me for not paying attention
customer_reviews.text: Single piece despite the pictures. Stupid me for not paying attention. Despite that, this thing blocks the sun. Our 1 yr old is the complete opposite of our oldest, and is the lightest sleeping human in existance. As soon as we put this blackout curtain up in their room, she has been sleeping well into 8:00AM (sometimes.) A must have for Arizona, especially East or South facing windows.
customer_reviews.author: Handsome

customer_reviews.title: Great as blackouts, short on looks
customer_reviews.text: Whats the point of tabs when they hang exactly the same as with the pocket. Had them for a few months and they haven't relaxed at all. Don't like the way they hang. But they are great blackout curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Works great, happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Eclipse generally makes good products. The actual curtains are pretty spot on to the colors shown, and the fabric does not attract the hair from my husky, which is a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Works almost too good LOL
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about these curtains is they almost make the room too dark. They look really nice and keep the light out perfectly. However when you have a teenager it's really hard to get him up in the morning because it is so dark. He seems asleep and even later on the weekends now because it is so dark in his room. But it does seem warmer in there and they do exactly as expected to for keeping the light out. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look as expected
customer_reviews.text: These look kind of cheap. I originally bought another set from Walmart (same brand as this) and expected it to look the same, but it doesn’t. I might re-order directly from Walmart if they carry the length I need. These do sufficiently block out light though.
customer_reviews.author: p_mensah

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a unique window curtain that could zap out the light from emitting into my room. All i can say is that this is one awesome blackout curtain i have ever seen and just absolutely love it, went ahead and ordered more to complete my rooms. Pros: Light, quality fabric & totally does block out the light (99%)! Cons: A bit costly on my side, but worth the while. Would absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: knarf

customer_reviews.title: you will need something better.
customer_reviews.text: Calling these "blackout" curtains is a bit of an exaggeration. They are thick curtains that block out a lot of light, but bright sunlight will definitely still come through a little. If you just need curtains to block out light at night, these will do very well (they work for my purposes). If you need to block out sunlight, you will need something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has always been impossible to tell night from day ...
customer_reviews.text: It has always been impossible to tell night from day in our bedroom, mostly because our apartment complex installed a lamp right outside our window. Now, it is still impossible to tell night from day, mostly because I am too lazy to open the curtains in the morning. Get the Eclipse Room Darkening Wrap Rod to close the gaps between your wall and your window, throw a towel on top, and you too will be completely blind, even at noon.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality it blocks the sun! I love it the affordable and the texture is soft!
customer_reviews.author: Shiela Proenza

customer_reviews.title: These work really well to keep it dark in my ...
customer_reviews.text: These work really well to keep it dark in my bedroom. My husband works overnight and sleeps in the morning until mid afternoon, so he needs it dark. They definitely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: NeedsMoreCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Blocks light really well!
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains! We hung them in our living room and it eliminated glare on our TV :) They feel nice to touch and are heavy weight. The color is nice and fairly true to the display photograph (maybe a tad lighter in person). I have a suspicion it may be trapping heat in our apartment, but we just crack the windows and keep the curtains drawn and it solves the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Se

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sized Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our den, which we receive the afternoon sun. I wanted something that would block out the sun and the heat associated with it. These have done both, with ease. They are truly "black out" curtains. We plan on ordering these for every room in the house. As a bonus, they reduce the amount of noise we used to hear outside. Perfect in all ways and an excellent price point.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: It was okay because I read the reviews and that helped me decide. Otherwise I would not know that there is knle one piece. I hope this helps the other people buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: chechil

customer_reviews.title: They were great. New home with higher ceilings and windows
customer_reviews.text: I had another pair of curtains from Eclipse. They were great. New home with higher ceilings and windows. Had to buy new ones that were longer. The Fresno that I just bought were equally as good. I leave for work early in the morning therefore frequently go to bed before the sun goes down. These block just about all the light and make going to be a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Glen S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and function well
customer_reviews.text: Great black out drapes. They keep our guest room dark! It’s great for my California guests because of the time change; they can sleep in and wake up with bright shiny faces
customer_reviews.author: Chelly StClair

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Relationship
customer_reviews.text: I have two 70 some inch tall windows in my bedroom, and once the sun was up so was my partner. Which means I also had to be awake. After months of being woke up at 6-7 AM on a weekend I broke down and bought two of these. Not only have they kept my room warmer, but insulating the windows, but they let in VERY little light. I am so happy with these, and I can sleep in at last.
customer_reviews.author: John Archer

customer_reviews.title: Curtains worth it
customer_reviews.text: Curtains are heavy for my rods, I used for my small door windows. But these would work for a bigger window and larger rods. They did do there job darkening my house and keeping the heat out.
customer_reviews.author: CRUIZ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are great blackout curtains, they are high quality very thick material and I was able to put them on a tension rod. Significantly keeps the sun out as well as my bedroom cool. I could sleep through the day without even knowing it is light out. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AdrA

customer_reviews.title: Eclipse Fresno 52 x 84 in Blackout Window Curtains, Black
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first set of black curtains from Bed, Bath & Beyond and they were 2 or 3 times the amount of these. These curtains were not only less expensive, but they are VERY HIGH quality. I was delightfully surprised. I am using it for the purpose of blocking bright light coming into my room in the morning where I live and it makes it very hot where I live. Again, thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MULAN_2003

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but other one was shorter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my window in my business space and they are awesome. The reason for my okay rating is solely because the other curtain panel I ordered the same length and width on both of them; exception of one being significantly shorter than the other. By significantly, I mean like 2-2 1/2in shorter. I love the curtain color and it goes very well with everything within my space. Nice, moderately thick material which I prefer. Really soft when I took them out of the packaging. Overall they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Blocks all the light - great blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: I bought these curtains for my son since he is working nights. It has been a lifesaver. He is able to sleep now through the day with no problem. They definitely block all the light. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DKW

customer_reviews.title: Block out the sun.
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with too much heat and bought this to help, and it does. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice room darkening curtains!
customer_reviews.text: Love these curtains!!!! I have a really bright west facing apartment and it really helps with the afternoon sun and my a/c costs. It also keeps my apartment much darker when the sun starts coming in, which is really nice at times to have. Easy to hang and a good price. Color matched nicely with my neutral colors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: This was too stiff for what I needed it for.. VERY heavy duty, almost like cavas material.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be very good quality and picture looks exactly like the color
customer_reviews.text: Needed these as I'm on second shift and they fit with a dark blue room I have. These seem to be very good quality and picture looks exactly like the color. They definitely do help with noise a slight bit as well. Definitely recommend, hope they work well during summer too!
customer_reviews.author: Austin S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! They block ALL light out
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! They block ALL light out, they look very nice, and they've got some weight to them so they don't move all over the place for no reason. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Gallman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy black out curtains. Good price for the curtains.
customer_reviews.author: dlv1156

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The stitching is off and the material is cheap! I was expecting better quality but I was disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These are not the most beautiful curtains, it's true, but they really do block out the light! It's not 100%, so I'm not sure how much help they'd be if you're working nights but if you just want some extra relief from street-lamps etc I'd really recommend them. First few nights we had them up we had trouble getting out of bed in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: person

customer_reviews.title: Not very dark really. Definitely not blackout. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very dark really. Definitely not blackout. They just darken up the room a little bit more than most curtains do.
customer_reviews.author: Josue J.

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: They black out the light and the heat. They are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Panels different sized
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the same size (108 inches long) and they are atleast 3 inches different in length! So frustrating because I paid extra for the length. I would expect them to be the same size!
customer_reviews.author: JosieMe

customer_reviews.title: Great blackout
customer_reviews.text: I’m really picky with my blackout curtains and these curtains did the job! I do have another set of curtains on top of these in a light color just for looks but they block a lot of light by themselves
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased the same brand at Walmart and these ones seem to be a much better quality!
customer_reviews.author: leanna

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly light weight
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot lighter than I thought they would be for drapery, however this has not made it less effective at its job. These are perfect for my room and let's my husband sleep during the day undisturbed after working all night long
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blackout Curtains!
customer_reviews.text: There are many other reviews detailing the specifics, so I'll simply add: keep a clock handy, because with these over your window you'll never know what time it is. The thicker material also helps them provide more insulation than lighter curtain types would.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised to block out a lot of sunlight, however from my experience there is still a little bit of sunlight shining through the curtains probably about 20% of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly blackout curtains! I've tried different "blackout" curtains for the past few months and none have worked as well as these. I highly recommend anyone thinking/looking for blackout curtains to invest in these.
customer_reviews.author: Phoua yang

customer_reviews.title: These were the key to making my old apartment livable.  Amazing light blocking and sound reduction.
customer_reviews.text: These work as advertised. They have a nice finish and you would never suspect that they were a blackout curtain. They also do a great job with sound reduction. If you have a noisy room or apartment, these are your solution! You will be amazed!
customer_reviews.author: James C Clingman

customer_reviews.title: THEY ONLY SENT ONE.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine curtain or whatever, but they only sent me ONE curtain.... ONE, now I have to wait for the other after I threw out my old curtains...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Flack

customer_reviews.title: 4. 5 stars. My only gripe is that ...
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars. My only gripe is that, even with how small the brackets are, even just an inch of light getting through can brighten up a room quite a bit (and I can't sleep with light in a room.) We've had to place items against the edge of the curtain (like our lamp) to limit this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Get a good curtain rod kit and you're all set
customer_reviews.text: I work nights and therefore sleep largely during daylight hours. These make a huge difference in keeping my room dark even during the brightest hours of the day. Also a very reasonable price. Get a good curtain rod kit and you're all set.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: but at this price this product does a fairly good job at blocking the sun out almost completely
customer_reviews.text: Yes you will see tiny microscopic holes, but at this price this product does a fairly good job at blocking the sun out almost completely.however you will need to anchor the edges to the wall otherwise light will shine through the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Livinsky

customer_reviews.title: as I liked another Eclipse product much better
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, however I did return them, as I liked another Eclipse product much better. These didn't seem like they would stand up to a machine washing, and the Bradley series did a better job of blocking the light. These did help keep heat out and keep room cooler.
customer_reviews.author: highlandbound

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i needed. my room is as dark as my soul now. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: John 117

customer_reviews.title: Best Ones I Have Seen
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Black Out Curtains in the past and these are by FAR the best ones I've seen! The material is so soft yet it truly does what it says and blocks the light. Living in Florida, that is saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Color isn’t accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with my purchase. The description states the color is “Expresso” which is a mixture of black and brown. However, the color of my curtains were more like a milk chocolate. When i saw the color I immediately returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha

product_meta.title: ECLIPSE Fresno Thermal Insulated Single Panel Rod Pocket Darkening Curtains for Living Room, 52" x 84", Black
product_meta.description: Size:52" x 84"| Color:BlackExperience the silence, darkness, and beauty of one of a kind Eclipse curtains a collection of energy saving window panels that deliver both fashion and function for the home. Eclipse curtains are designed to block out over 99 percent of light and reduce unwanted noise. The magic is in the Thermaweave construction. The innovative triple weave is designed to provide all of the light blocking, noise reducing and energy saving benefits you desire, without comprising style. Whether you are looking to enhance your existing decor or going for a complete room makeover, these chic panels are versatile enough to enhance any space. Put Eclipse Fresno Thermaweave window panels to work anywhere in your home. Hang them in your living room for better TV viewing or in the nursery or kids' room to keep out unwanted light and noise. These panels provide the ultimate in blackout performance and help to lower heating and cooling costs in your home. hang two or more window panels on a standard or decorative rod for optimal coverage. Available in wheat, mushroom, and dark blue. Panels sold separately and measure 52 inch wide in your choice of 84 inch or 95 inch lengths. Rods sold separately. 100 percent Polyester. Machine wash, tumble dry, do not bleach. Imported.
feature_bullets: 52 inches (W) x 84 inches (L) Single Panel Blackout Curtain
THERMAWEAVE Technology: Blocks 99 percentage of light making the curtains thick enough to completely keep out sunlight and UV ray
NOISE REDUCING: Blackout curtains also work as a noise reducer absorbing 40 percentage of noise to keep a quiet environment
ROD POCKET: Also called pole top or casement curtains with casing sewn onto the back of the curtain panel at the top allowing the rod to slip through unseen

Experience the darkness, silence and beauty of Eclipse curtains. Eclipse panels have been laboratory tested to block out intrusive light, unwanted noise and can help you save on home heating and cooling costs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,581 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures
